entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
